help.title: Help & FAQ
help.q1: How do I become a blood donor?
help.a1: To become a donor, simply sign up through the app and complete your profile. Ensure you meet the health and eligibility criteria for blood donation.
help.q2: What are the eligibility criteria for donating blood?
help.a2: Generally, you must be in good health, be at least 18 years old, and weigh at least 50 kg (110 lbs). Specific criteria may vary, so please consult a medical professional.
help.a3: Switch to 'Recipient' mode from the settings or your dashboard. Then, click the 'New Request' button and fill in the required details. Your request will be sent to nearby eligible donors.
help.a4: Yes, we prioritize your privacy. Your contact details are only shared with a user when you accept their request or offer. All data is securely encrypted.
